name: Breadcrumb
description: Navigation trail showing the current page location within a hierarchical structure

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as navigation with 'Breadcrumb' label. Current page is indicated with aria-current='page'. Links are navigable via keyboard. Separator elements are hidden from assistive technology.

recommendedUsage: Use on pages with deep hierarchical structure to help users understand their location and navigate back to parent pages. Place consistently at the top of page content.
antiPatterns: Do not use for flat site structures with few levels. Avoid using as primary navigation. Do not include the current page as a link.
